pages.thanks: Thank You for Choosing SailSpin - Confirmation and Next Steps Thank You for Reaching Out! We appreciate you taking the time to connect with us here at SailSpin. Your input is invaluable in helping us create a better experience for all our users. Our team is always eager to hear from our community, and we're thrilled that you chose to share your thoughts with us. Rest assured that your message has been successfully delivered to our team. We carefully read and consider every message we receive, as each one contributes to the continuous improvement of our platform. While we strive to respond as quickly as possible, please allow some time for our team to review your message and prepare a thoughtful response. We understand the importance of your inquiry, and we want to ensure that we provide you with the most accurate and helpful information. pages.disclaimer: SailSpin Disclaimer - Legal Information and Terms +44-121-504-9100 sailspin@gmail.com Mucklow Hill, Halesowen B62 8EP, UK 18+ SailSpin Home Join Services Possibilities Suggestions Why are we Disclaimer Responsible Gaming SailSpin is committed to promoting responsible gaming. We encourage our users to gamble responsibly and to seek help if they feel that they may have a gambling problem. If you think you may have a gambling problem, please seek help from a professional organization such as Gamblers Anonymous or the National Council on Problem Gambling. SailSpin also provides tools and resources to help our users gamble responsibly, including self-exclusion and deposit limits. If you would like more information about these tools and resources, please contact our customer support team. Account Security SailSpin takes the security of our users' accounts very seriously. We use industry-standard encryption technology to protect your personal and financial information. However, it is important for you to take steps to protect your account as well. You should never share your login credentials with anyone, and you should always log out of your account when you are finished using our website or services. If you suspect that someone has gained unauthorized access to your account, please contact our customer support team immediately. User Conduct By using SailSpin, you agree to abide by our rules of conduct. These rules include, but are not limited to: No spamming or harassment of other users No use of offensive or abusive language No cheating or fraudulent activity No unauthorized access to or use of our website or services If you violate these rules of conduct, we reserve the right to terminate your account and/or take legal action against you. Termination SailSpin reserves the right to terminate your account and/or your access to our website or services at any time and for any reason. If we terminate your account, you will not be entitled to any refunds or compensation for any losses or damages incurred as a result of the termination. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold harmless SailSpin, its parent companies, subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs, or debt, and expenses (including but not limited to attorney's fees) arising from: Your use of and access to SailSpin Your violation of any term of this Disclaimer Your violation of any third-party right, including without limitation any copyright, property, or privacy right Any claim that one of your submissions caused damage to a third party This defense and indemnification obligation will survive this Disclaimer and your use of SailSpin. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Disclaimer, please contact us at sailspin@gmail.com. pages.privacy-policy: SailSpin Privacy Policy - Your Data Protection +44-121-504-9100 sailspin@gmail.com Mucklow Hill, Halesowen B62 8EP, UK 18+ SailSpin Home Join Services Possibilities Suggestions Why are we Privacy Policy Third-Party Links The Services may contain links to third-party websites, apps, and other online services. These links are not an endorsement of, or representation that we are affiliated with, any third party. We do not control third-party websites, apps or online services, and we are not responsible for their actions. Other websites and services follow different rules regarding the use or disclosure of the personal information you submit to them. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of the other websites and services you use. User-Generated Content We may make available on the Services, or link to, features that allow you to share information online (e.g., on message boards, in chat areas, in file uploads, through events, etc.). Please be aware that whenever you voluntarily disclose personal information online, that information becomes public and can be collected and used by others. We have no control over, and take no responsibility for, the use, storage or dissemination of such publicly-disclosed personal information. By posting personal information online in public forums, you may receive unsolicited messages from other parties. Social Sharing Features The Services may offer social sharing features and other integrated tools (such as the Facebook "Like" button), which let you share actions you take on the Services with other media, and vice versa. The use of such features enables the sharing of information with your friends or the public, depending on the settings you establish with the entity that provides the social sharing feature. For more information about the purpose and scope of data collection and processing in connection with social sharing features, please visit the privacy policies of the entities that provide these features. Do Not Track Some web browsers may transmit "do-not-track" signals to the websites and other online services with which the browser communicates. There is no standard that governs what, if anything, websites and online services should do when they receive these signals. We currently do not take action in response to these signals. If and when a standard for responding is established, we may revisit our policy on responding to these signals. International Users The Services are hosted in the United Kingdom and are intended for and directed to users in the United Kingdom. If you are accessing the Services from the European Union, Asia, or any other region with laws or regulations governing personal data collection, use, and disclosure, that differ from United Kingdom laws, please be advised that through your continued use of the Services, which are governed by United Kingdom law, this Privacy Policy, and our Terms of Service, you are transferring your personal information to the United Kingdom and you consent to that transfer. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at sailspin@gmail.com. SailSpin Our links Home Join Services Possibilities Suggestions Why are we Additional links Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms of use 18+
